title: Ghislaine Maxwell is Found Guilty | Guest Host: Justin Barclay | 12/30/21
description:
Justin Barclay fills in for Glenn Beck. Jury finds Ghislaine Maxwell guilty on five counts in sex trafficking trial. More information has come out about Omicron. Could Omicron lead to herd immunity? The politics related to Covid need to stop. Too many people are getting hurt because of it. Julie Kelly from American Greatness joins Justin Barclay to discuss the Governor Whitmer abduction case.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
